Who are we?

The company has been dealing passenger traffic since 1992.

All of our buses fit the strict international standards.

Our drivers have a lot of experience in European travel.

In 2021, we have expanded our activities with freight transport! We currently have 4 vehicles. Our vehicles have a total weight of 12,15,18,18 tonna, which you can view by clicking HERE. We are waiting for our future customers!

Our partners:

  • travel agencies
  • music bands
  • companies
  • foundations
  • schools
  • sports associations
  • or just a group of friends

Gallery

Travelling around the world

We are often renewing our bus fleet, so our customers can still travel at luxury level. Depending on the number of passenger we have elevated or double-decker buses or just minibuses with all the extras (air conditioning, toilet, DVD).

Experience

We have nearly 30 years of experience in travel. We are constantly listening to the feedback of our customers, thus ensuring the highest quality service.

Safety

The technical status and aesthetic condition of our vehicles is impeccable. Our drivers strictly adhere to the rest time, guaranteeing that you feel safe during your trip.

Adventure

Our services also include the organization of individual trips, with which we can provide our passengers with an unforgettable experience. You can request a quotation by clicking here.
